title: New: East of Ely – Waterfalls
content:
Sydney five piece East of Ely have a knack for penning massive hooks and colossal choruses.

Their first two tracks, Easy Friend and Came Without were classic, Springsteen tinged numbers, the sort of tracks you’d put on a road trip CD, preferably a trip involving plenty of driving along never ending, expansive highways. Their third offering, Waterfalls, is another slice of Americana infused indie-pop, centred around fist pumping choruses that The Killers would be proud of. Check out Waterfalls below, and pre-order the EP here.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
